```r
#Join the two datasets
full_dataset <- full_join(sim_av_patient, sim_av_tumour, by = \PATIENTID\)
```
```

```r
#Check how many unique Patient IDs there are
n_distinct(full_dataset$PATIENTID)
```

```r
#2,200,626 <- the same number as there are patients. So do some patients have two tumour records?
#Make a frequency table and count how many are >1
PATIENTID_freq <- table(full_dataset$PATIENTID, useNA = \always\")

table(table(full_dataset$PATIENTID))
